name: move freddy simulator
description:
press the left arrow key for freddy to go left press the right arrow key for freddy to move right press the up arrow for freddy to move up press the down arrow  for freddy to move down press the T key for freddy to talk and if you like this subcribe to the angry gamer on youtube here is the link
